import React from 'react' import { useCartContext } from '../../context/CartContext' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faTrashAlt } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; const ListCartItems = () => { const {clearCart, cart, removeItem} = useCartContext() let total = 0; return (
{cart.map(element => )}
# Nombre Cantidad Precio Total por unidad
{element.item.name} {element.qty} {element.item.price} {element.item.price*element.qty}
{cart.map(element => { return total = element.item.price * element.qty + total} )}
 Total $ {total}
) } export default ListCartItems
